## âœ… Checklist

Please ensure you've completed the following:

### Code Quality

### Testing

- [ ] I have tested on Firefox (latest)
- [ ] I have tested on Safari (latest)
- [ ] I have tested on mobile devices / responsive design

- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md (if applicable)

### Accessibility
